LINE.Definition: The term "all items" refers to all the detailed consumption goods and services used in the estimation of the RPPs.
Goods refer to durable and nondurable consumption goods used in the estimation of the RPPs.
Rents include rents paid by tenants and an imputed rental value for owner-occupied dwellings.
Other services refer to services consumption products, except rents, that are used in the estimation of the RPPs.
